data.title: Desmond Tutu Health Foundation
data.text:
&nbsp

What is the Purpose of This Form

To assist the Desmond Tutu HIV Foundation in selecting a person for an advertised post. This form may be used to identify candidates to be interviewed. Since all applicants cannot be interviewed, you need to fill in this form completely, accurately and legibly. This will help to process your application fairly.

&nbsp

Who Should Complete This Form

Only person wishing to apply for an advertised position at Desmond Tutu HIV Foundation.

&nbsp

Additional Information

This form requires basic information. Candidates who are selected for interviews will be requested to furnish additional certified information that may be required to make a final selection.

&nbsp

Special Notes

All information will be treated with the strictest confidentiality

and will not be disclosed or used for any other purpose than to assess the suitability of a person, except in so far as it may be required and permitted by law. Your personal details must correspond with the details in your

ID or passport.

Passport number in the case of non-South Africans.

This information is required to enable the organisation to comply with the Employment Equity Act, 1998.

This information will only be taken into account if it directly relates to the requirements of the position.

Applicants with substantial qualifications or work experience must attach a CV

&nbsp

A. The advertised post. (All fields are required.)

Position for which you are applying (as advertised) *

Reference number (as stated in the advert) *

How much notice must you serve with your current employer? *

How did you hear about this position? *

&nbsp

B. Personal information. (Certain fields are not required.)

Surname *

First Names *

Date of Birth *

ID Number *

Physical Address *

&nbsp

Race *

AfricanWhiteColouredIndian

&nbsp

Gender *

FemaleMale

&nbsp

Do you have a disability? *

NoYesPartial

&nbsp

Are you a South African citizen? *

YesNo

&nbsp

Are you applying for one of the following vacancies? *

Research Nurse

Medical officer

Pharmacist

Social Worker

Laboratory related jobs

NoYes

Have you ever been convicted of a criminal offence or been dismissed from employment? *

NoYes

&nbsp

C. How do we contact you? (All fields are required.)

Preferred language for correspondence? *

Telephone number during office hours *

&nbsp

EmailContact number

How do we contact you? (in terms of above) *

&nbsp

D. Language proficiency (All fields are required.)

Specify the languages you speak. *

State how well you speak these languages using the words, "Good, Fair, Poor". *

State how well you read in these languages using the words, "Good, Fair, Poor". *

State how well you write in these languages using the words, "Good, Fair, Poor". *

&nbsp

E. Qualifications (All fields are required.)

Provide details of any qualifications obtained, or courses attended, to support your application.

Name of the school/technical college you graduated from *

Qualifications obtained at the institution/s name above *

State which year you obtained these qualifications *

Provide details of any qualifications obtained at any tertiary institutions:

Name of the institution/s *

Qualifications obtained at the institution/s name above *

State which year you obtained these qualifications *

&nbsp

F. Work Experience (All fields are required.)

Please state your past work experiences below. Ensure you've added the following details. *

employer

the post held

start date to end date (month and year)

the reason for leaving

&nbsp

If you are currently employed, please specify how much you earn annually below. If you are not currently employed, please specify how much you earned at your last place of employment. *

What is your salary expectation for the vacancy you are applying for? *

&nbsp

G. References (All fields are required.)

Please state ALL your references below. include the following *

Name

Relationship to you

Company/organisation

Tel. No. (office hours) and Email address

Please upload your updated CV here. Your CV should include Language Proficiency, Qualifications, Work Experience and References. For better deliverability, ensure your attachment is a PDF or Microsoft Word Doc and is smaller than 20MB. *

&nbsp

Declaration

I declare that all the information provided (including any attachments) is complete and correct to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false information supplied could lead to my application being disqualified or my discharge if I am appointed. *

&nbsp
